word: H5472 - סוּג - çûwg - soog - Backslider - பின்வாங்கியவன்

sections.paragraph: to move, to go, to turn back, to move away, to backslide
a) (Qal) to backslide, to prove recreant to
1) to turn oneself away, to turn back
2) to be turned or driven back, to be repulsed

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to flinch, that is, (by implication) to go back, literally (to retreat) or figuratively (to apostatize): - backslider, drive, go back, turn (away, back).
Cognate: H5253, H5472, H5509, H7734, H7873
